subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: Trevor Bayne, who won the Daytona 500 on Sunday in his second Sprint Cup race, will stay in the second-tier Nationwide Series this season.
snippet: Trevor Bayne, who won the Daytona 500 on Sunday in his second Sprint Cup race, will stay in the second-tier Nationwide Series this season.
